entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:21 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -40.6°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
